attribute.name: dataPublicKey
attribute.description: The public key of recaptcha component

attribute.name: dataPrivateKey
attribute.description: The private key of recaptcha component

attribute.name: dataOnLoad
attribute.description: Recaptcha js parameter onload Value - name of callback function Optional. The callback function that gets called when all the dependencies have loaded.

attribute.name: dataRender
attribute.description: Recaptcha js parameter render Values - explicit , onload Optional. Whether to render the widget explicitly. Defaults to onload, which will render the widget in the first g-recaptcha tag it finds.

attribute.name: dataLanguage
attribute.description: Recaptcha js parameter hl language Values - one of list avaliable language code Optional. Forces the widget to render in a specific language. Auto-detects the user's language if unspecified.

attribute.name: dataTheme
attribute.description: Recaptcha render parameter data-theme Values - dark , light - default: light Optional. The color theme of the widget.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter data-type Values - audio , image - default: image Optional. The type of CAPTCHA to serve

attribute.name: dataSize
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter data-size Values - compact , normal - default: normal Optional. The size of the widget.

attribute.name: dataTabIndex
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter data-tabindex Values - compact , normal - default: normal Optional. The size of the widget.

attribute.name: dataCallback
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter data-callback Value - function name Optional. Your callback function that's executed when the user submits a successful CAPTCHA response. The user's response, g-recaptcha-response, will be the input for your callback function.

attribute.name: dataExpiredCallback
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter data-expiredcallback Value - function name Optional. Your callback function that's executed when the recaptcha response expires and the user needs to solve a new CAPTCHA.

attribute.name: dataClass
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter class Value - css class values Optional. Method to provide access to class parameter in recatcha component.

attribute.name: dataStyle
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter style Value - inline style values Optional. Method to provide access to style parameter in recatcha component.

attribute.name: dataIncludeNoScript
attribute.description: Recaptcha type parameter for include no script Value - true or false Optional. Method to provide style when client js no activated.
